message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a little high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $10,000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 might be a stretch for you. However, I'm still confident that the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $11,500 is still a bit too high for my budget. I'm willing to offer $10,500. I think that's a fair price.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $10,750. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  To be honest, $10,500 is the highest I can go. If you're unable to accept that, I understand, but I might have to explore other options.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,700. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
